text: Považská Bystrica (; ) is a city in northwestern Slovakia. It is on the river Váh and is about 30 km southwest of Žilina. About 37,000 people live there. == Population == == Sights == * Považský hrad * Church of the Visitation of the Virgin Mary * Manor house of Orlové, built in 1612 * The church of Saint Helena, built in 1728 * The church of St. Ladislaus, built in the 19th century == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Photogallery Category:Cities in Slovakia
title: Považská Bystrica
